events.guildCreate:
Thank You for adding Lifeguard to your server!
To begin using Lifeguard, ~~visit https://url/{id}/settings~~ run `!setup`

ping.description: Check if the bot is alive.
ping.title: Pong! :ping_pong:

collector.end: Thank you for setting up Lifeguard.

setup.description: Sets up guild for use with Lifeguard. Type `help` after the collecter has started to see more information!

warn.description: Appends a warning to the specified user.

errors.noUser: The specified user has not been found.

inf.desc: You have received a warning in {guild} with reason: `{reason}`.
inf.title: Warning
inf.responseDesc: Warned {user} with reason: `{reason}`. (User has been notified)

random.description: Flips a coin and selects a random number from given range.

errors.argsNAN: One of the given arguments is not a number.

remind.description: Reminds you on whatever you need help remembering.
remind.body: Okay, I will remind you at `{timestamp}` about `{text}`.
remind.reminder: :alarm_clock: You asked me to remind you at `{timestamp}` about `{text}`.

errors.noPermissions: I don't have the permissions to announce your message in that channel.

announce.announced: Your message has been announced in the channel!
announce.confirmation: Here's your message, ready to announce it?

slowmode.description: Chat going too fast? Slow it down.

errors.notValidArgument: Not a valid argument, please use `here` or `channel`.
errors.onlyTextChannel: Slowmode can only be set for text channels.

slowmode.setSlowmodeInChannel: I have set the slowmode to `{time}` in the `#{channel}` channel.

errors.nonValidArgument: Not a valid argument, please use one of the following:```all, user, bots, until, between```.
errors.NAN: Provided argument is not a number.

cleanedUser.message: Cleaned `{amount}` messages from user {tag} in this channel.

cat.description: Cats! What more is there to expect?

kick.description: Kicks the specified user from the server.

errors.notKickable: The specified user was unable to be kicked.
errors.noUser: The specified user has not been found.

inf.desc: You have been kicked from {guild} with reason: `{reason}`.
inf.title: Kick
inf.responseDesc: Kicked {user} with reason: `{reason}`. (User has been notified)

ban.description: Bans the specified user from the server.

errors.notBannable: The specified user was unable to be banned.
errors.noUser: The specified user has not been found.

inf.desc: You have been banned from {guild} with reason: `{reason}`.
inf.title: Ban
inf.responseDesc: Banned {user} with reason: `{reason}`. (User has been notified)

forceban.description: Forcefully Bans the specified user from the server.

errors.notBannable: The specified user was unable to be banned.
errors.noUser: The specified user has not been found.

inf.desc: You have been force banned from {guild} with reason: `{reason}`.
inf.title: Force Ban
inf.responseDesc: Force Banned {user} with reason: `{reason}`. (User has been notified)

mention.description: Make a role mentionable or unmentionable.

errors.notValidRole: The provided role ID is invalid.

role.description: Add/remove roles or list people with certain roles.

errors.notValidRole: The provided role ID is invalid.
errors.notValidMember: The provided member ID is invalid.
errors.notValidRoleName: The provided role name is invalid.

inf.desc: You have been muted in {guild} with reason: {reason}
inf.title: Mute
inf.responseDesc: Muted {user} with reason: `{reason}`. (User has been notified)

errors.noUser: The specified user has not been found.

info.description: Want to find out something about a user? Check their info.

avatar.description: Check out this user's gnarly profile picture!!!

unban.description: Unbans the specified user from the server.
